name: Upgrade Tool
subtitle: Gives Detailed info about an Upgrade on a pedestal. Also used to see the work area of an upgraded pedestal.

pages.title: Upgrade Tool
pages.text: 11/10 Craft this tool if you dont already have one. Arguably more useful then the $(l:pedestals:tools/linkingtool)Linking Tool$().

pages.title: Crafting Alt.
pages.text: Gotten by $(l)Crouch + Right Click (In Air)$() with a $(l:pedestals:tools/tagtool)Tag Tool$()

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Right Click$() a pedestal with an upgrade to see details about the upgrade. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() a pedestal with an upgrade to select it, if the upgrade interacts with blocks in-world, it will display particles in the effective work area.$(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() any non pedestal block to clear the selected pedestal.

pages.title: Interactions Cont.
pages.text: $(li)When in the $(l)OFFHAND, LEFT CLICK$() a pedestal to remove its upgrade. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() in the air to swap this into the $(l:pedestals:tools/toolswapper)Tool Swapper$()
